Text: tried bomberman couldn't do it sorry.

But... HOW you could convert cd to dwd?

T_T
I tryed everything...

Can anybody tell me name of that prog.?!

You have to do a rebuilt which involves using isobuster to extract the files to your harddrive then using cd dvd sony generator adding a dummy file and patching files to dvd instead of cd checks (DVDscan37).

here's a link that shows how to rebuilt games with cds you do the same but add the dummy file and patch files to dvd with dvdscan37, please note not all ps2 cd games can be rebuilt to dvd successfully.

http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/275350
